author: Source: Redditch Advertiser
title: Lamar Odom 'was using drugs at Nevada brothel' - Redditch Advertiser
text:
Former basketball star and estranged husband of Khloe Kardashian, Lamar Odom, had been using cocaine and sexual performance-enhancing pills before he was found unresponsive in a brothel, according to 911 calls. Odom was rushed to hospital on Tuesday after being found by staff at the Love Ranch legal brothel in Crystal, Nevada.
 Redditch Advertiser.
